H0.text: Oxygen is the element that animals breathe in air in order to obtain.

H1.text: Water is the element that animals breathe in air to obtain.

H2.text: Nitrogen is the element that animals breathe in air in order to obtain.

H3.text: Carbon is the element that animals breathe in air to obtain.

A4.text: Respiration (physiology), transporting oxygen and carbon dioxide between cells and the external environment
